item.title: CodeIgniter-minify update
item.description: Just introduce some new options to my quite popular library CodeIgniter-minify . From now one you can chose CSS compression engine (cssmin || minify), also FORCE rewrite CSS files. Some speed improvements were also made. Please feel to checkout library on GitGub â€“ CodeIgniter-minify
